Articles.Content:
Large craft. Only at launch pad. Engine not even started. It wobbling a lot. Any suggestion? Solution?

Well, It seems that I have found the solution again...

This is my process.

1) Toggle the gimbals for ALL the engines (which support disable/enable gimbals). Including that upper stage engines.

2) Remove all the Wings. (This has to be done at the Assembly stage. Sorry).

3) EVA my Kerbal, then went back to seat/command pod.

4) Walla, the ship become stable....

Edited August 23, 2013 by Sirine

More struts or braces.

Also, does the craft really need to be that big at launch, or can it be pieced together in orbit via docking smaller, more manageable (and less wobbly) segments?

3) EVA my Kerbal, then went back to seat/command pod.

This.. helped with wobble?
